changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Really fixed badge count not removing in some situations. I think.
•Removed "Keep Unread Indicator", sorry, it's buggy
•Compiled arm64e slice for iOS 14

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Attempt to fix failed to remove badges for some unknown reason in some unknown situations
•Fixed a potential crash

NEW FEATURES:
•Added option to keep unread indicator in the app. Off by default.

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed badge count not removed in some situations, especially when device is in deep sleep
•Improved overall reliability, this most likely will fix "Mark All as Read" not working for iOS 12
